Oblitertron/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Demon Wulf/Sixshot/Ares/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot/Unitron/Chaos/Minion:


Dark Claw, still in his war vehicle mode, didn't make a noise as autogun fire 
dug slightly into his armored mode, fired off another two missiles at the 
Mafia base (it is the Mafia's, isn't it?)

---

Flesh Ripper fired off three bolts from his rifle at Gigas.

---

Demon Wulf fired off three crimson optic blasts at Sharpedge.

---

Sixshot barrel rolled, his underbelly being hit by two shots, but not in 
important areas.  He armed his missile launchers, beginning to make another 
pass.

---

Ares turned his turret, bring all four cannons to point a little ways to the 
side of the area of the Mafia base he had been firing on.  He fired four 
shots from each cannon, a total of sixteen shots lancing out at the Mafia 
base.

---

Chaos fired off ten rapid optic blasts at Horn Drill

---

Minion yelled out as autogun fire dug into his foot.  Raising his rifle, he 
fired off 25 explosive shells at the Mafia base.


===

Nemesis Enforcer and Scattershot got into CR chambers.
